The investigator test validity carbohydrate deficient transferrin ( CDT ) ( use capillary zone electrophoresis ) blood ethyl glucuronide ( EtG ) ( use Liquid Chromatography-MS-MS ) hair patient heavy alcohol use , moderate alcohol use patient drink alcohol .
